name: Sample Player (Scrub)
description: This algorithm is based on the Audio Playback with Scrub algorithm on the disting mk4. It allows direct control of sample playback position via CV input or a scrub parameter, simulating manually dragging tape over a playhead instead of motor-driven movement. The sample must be triggered before any playback occurs and again to change it (unless 'Retrigger on change' is enabled). Please review the section on features common to various Sample Players for additional context.
use_cases: Manual sample position control via CV or parameter mapping
Live manipulation of audio samples during performance
gui_description: The display shows the waveform, playhead position as a check mark above it, and current playback speed. Positive values indicate forwards playback; negative values indicate reversed playback.

input_ports.name: Scrub input
input_ports.description: CV input for controlling the sample playback position (scrubbing)

input_ports.name: Sample trigger
input_ports.description: Input to start or change sample playback

output_ports.name: Audio output
output_ports.description: Outputs the played audio sample with scrub position applied
